amendment.description: To provide $310 million over five years in mandatory funding for non-service pensions for World War II Filipino veterans, paid for closing corporate tax loopholes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3044 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3044 proposed by Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S2267; text: CR S2267) To provide $310 million over five years in mandatory funding for non-service pensions for World War II Filipino veterans, paid for closing corporate tax loopholes.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3044 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3044 proposed by Senator Akaka.
